title: Noam Chomsky - 2006-08-15 - Interview on Israel, Lebanon, Iraq, and Palestine - with David Barsamian
description:
Be sure to pick at least 720p for best sound quality.
On August 15, 2006, Noam Chomsky was interviewed at his office at MIT by David Barsamian on Israel, Lebanon, Palestine, and Iraq, etc.  Broadcast by KGNU Radio in Boulder, Colorado on August 17th.


De-noised and EQed, gone over second by second to fix microphone flubs, etc., so to sound better than the original broadcast.

Tags:

Chomsky, 2006, Lebanon, Israel, Hezbollah, Palestine, Gaza Election of 2006, Hamas, Hassan Nasrallah, Iran, Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Edward Peck, Walid Jumblatt, UN Security Council Resolution 1559, Iraq, Seymour Hersh, Ehud Barak, Ariel Sharon, PLO, Tanya Reinhart, Uri Avnery, David Ben-Gurion, Maronites, IDF, Dan Halutz, Cedar Revolution, Amal Movement, Rami Khouri, Pakistan, Saudi Arabia,Egypt, Nasser, George Kennan, Anwar Sadat, Muhammad Zia-ul-Haq, Dick Cheney, Donald Rumsfeld, Iraq War, Thomas Friedman, Hu Jintao, William Kristol, Muhammad Khatam, Condoleezza Rice, Mohamed ElBaradei,
